short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Screenshots and other extra features for developers working with Perfection

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension brings screenshot support for Perfection's collaborations features. It also add Inspect mode for developers from the Devtool panels.
